logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: Use project-specific "root" of source/binary dir, so we properly build as part of sdk.

logentry.author: toma
logentry.msg: Move kdevelop to extragear/sdk.

logentry.author: scripty
logentry.msg: SVN_SILENT made messages (.desktop file)

logentry.author: nsams
logentry.msg: Actually debugController is 0 on shutdown

logentry.author: nsams
logentry.msg: Fix tests by giving them some more time to update

logentry.author: nsams
logentry.msg: Fix crash on shutdown with active DebugSession

logentry.author: nsams
logentry.msg: Remove unused code; currentFrame/Thread is handled by FrameStackModel.

logentry.author: scripty
logentry.msg: SVN_SILENT made messages (.desktop file)

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg:
Revert removal of s_appRunning.
This change broke adding breakpoints while application is running, and had other bugs. The ideal solution is to add support for non-stop mode, including keeping per-thread 'running' state and automatically picking a suitable thread to use for inserting breakpoint. However, such changes are too big, and we're in feature freeze.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg:
Revert revision 1025632, whereby we switched -stack-list-variables.
That command never hit 7.0 branch, and there are various bikeshedy issues on gdb trunk.

logentry.author: dfaure
logentry.msg: Compile with -DQT_STRICT_ITERATORS

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Make code-completion work behind the 'case' keyword. Add some tests. Thanks for patch by Olivier.jg BUG: 211925

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: Sourceformatter support was disabled in kdevplatform, so disable the formatters.

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: Increase version number for Beta7

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Never temporarily modify macros in the current environment, as it crashes if the macro has been mmapped in read-only mode. Instead, insert temporary macros. BUG: 216071

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: The document may be deleted during waitForUpdate(), so only use the document for a short time.

logentry.author: danxuliu
logentry.msg: X-KDevelop-Interfaces has to list even those interfaces that are inherited

logentry.author: mwolff
logentry.msg: add QUrl pretty printer, makes printing of KUrls kinda work as well

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Don't run the parser at all when only the "TopDUContext::Empty" feature is requested.

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: When merging macro-sets that are already stored in a repository into an environment, insert the repository-macros directly, without copying each macro. This speeds up the preprocessing/parsing.

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: - Implement the "TopDUContext::SimplifiedDeclarationsAndContexts" feature-level in the C++ language support, which allows a simplified processing-level similar to ctags - Implement the "TopDUContext::Empty" feature-level which only produces top-context meta-information from the preprocessor (import-structure, macros, etc.) - Recursively check whether the required feature-set of child-contexts is satisfied when updating

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Enforce a duchain update of the switch candidate files when switching between header/source

logentry.author: scripty
logentry.msg: SVN_SILENT made messages (.desktop file)

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: Enforce english messages for make so our parsing works.

logentry.author: mmrozowski
logentry.msg: Make QtHelp plugin optional but enabled by default.

logentry.author: scripty
logentry.msg: SVN_SILENT made messages (.desktop file)

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: Fix fill empty lines setting and some related things. Patch by Olivier.jg, thanks. CCMAIL:olivier.jg@gmail.com BUG:213257

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg: also provide the range for the deprecated-command problem.

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg: Fix compilation and properly fix last bug.

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg:
Provide the Url when setting a problem.
BUG: 187628

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Fix code-completion for "ClassType instance(" constructor argument-hints, and potentially fix some other problems. Add test.

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg:
Don't crash in specific circumstances when newlines are involved. Thanks for the patch by Olivier.jg
BUG: 200233

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg: When try compile, if it's already on the cache, use that value. That way we will just return the always-true when we don't have a builddir. That makes it possible to work with kdebase/workspace.

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: If a cmake cache exists already in the builddir run cmake with "." so it simply re-reads cmakelists.txt and rebuilds its files based on the cache.

logentry.author: nsams
logentry.msg:
Implement QList pretty printer QList::node::t() in python to find out how QList stores it's data. Very hackish solution but I can't do it better.
BUG: 213459

logentry.author: nsams
logentry.msg: Remove dead declaration

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg:
Create the access-replacer object statically as a child of the foreground thread, so that its action is executed in the foreground thread as it should be, preventing possible crashes.
BUG: 214713

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg:
Added PROJECT_ variables relative to the binary dir. Resolve the possible output directories.
BUG: 203975

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Fix compilation

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: - Really compute the standard include-path only once, instead of calling gcc again and again - Fix the licence of cpputils.*, the code was just copied from another place.

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Properly check whether uses should be built

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Don't create error-highlights when no overloaded constructor was found (may also be the default constructor)

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg: Provide a decent initial page for the cmake documentation plugin.

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg:
If the cmake plugin doesn't depend on the cmake-doc plugin it shouldn't expect to find it installed.
(use case: documentation-toolview crashed upon starting, so I deleted both doc-plugins, which then crashed cmake-manager while opening a cmake file)

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg:
Greatly simplify the management of the macros owned by preprocess-environments. This should also close some memory-leaks.
CCBUG: 214298

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg:
Prevent creation of internal dirs in the cwd.
Set a proper temporary working directory when executing a process. If this is not done, any data the process creates will end up in KDevelop's current working directory.

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: Add a new top-level menu for Sessions.

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg:
Move valgrind to playground.
The valgrind plugin is currently broken and none of us has time to fix it up and bring it into a releaseable state. So lets move it to playground.
Add the needed boilerplate code to make it compile standalone.

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg:
Fixed rename algorithm for cmake. Do not rename project root to prevent a crash.
CCMAIL: 214273

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg:
Allow users to display a list of loaded plugins.
Add the new action to the rc file so users can access a list of all loaded plugins (even those that cannot be enabled/disabled).

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: - Fix a duchain problem where sometimes some uses were not built within an initializer. Specifically this happened when the initializer was mis-parsed as a parameter-declaration-clause. - Add test, and todo to also fix constructor-uses for that case.

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Improve the use-building for constructors: Make it work in nearly all known syntactical forms. In order to achieve this, the handling of SimpleDeclaration was moved into ExpressionVisitor instead of UseBuilder for declarations with init-declarators.

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg: save the properties documentation for cmake.

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg: properly update the file set while renaming

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: Show the cmake commandline thats being executed.

logentry.author: coles
logentry.msg:
Assigning icons to plugins for when they appear in the 'Configure Plugins' view.
- for kdevcmakebuilder, it was attempting to use 'gear', which is actually called 'system-run'. - valgrind, in lieu of anything better on offer, gets the 'debugger' icon, given that's the category in which it falls.

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg: Fix conditions. When undefined cmake just allows 1, guess why.

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg: Adapt to kdevplatform changes. Adds a very simple home page.

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg: Adapt to kdevplatform changes. Adds an index.

logentry.author: bbroeksema
logentry.msg: I forgot one test case for ctor uses.

logentry.author: bbroeksema
logentry.msg: Add a test for different kinds of constructor uses.

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Fix some problems during code-completion: Code-completion could become very slow for example behind "for(int a = 0;a<b->" due to a quadratic expansion of code completion contexts. Now parent-contexts are only created if they are actually different from the current context.

logentry.msg: Don't crash if a context disappears early while evaluating a type BUG: 213641

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Add copyright notice

logentry.msg: Make the connections non-queued, and reach the event on through a QPointer, to prevent a possible crash in eventuallyStartAssistant

logentry.msg: Be more robust if people don't use execute_process(COMMAND), this results in an empty commands-list.

logentry.msg: Do not show nameless declarations in the completion list

logentry.msg: Fix a test to get rid of invalid warnings.

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: Forgot to adjust this place when switching from url back to string for the makeBinary.

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: A string value is better for the makeBinary so we can properly support a plain name for the binary that we then search in PATH. This is a bit more code, but makes it clear that this item is a bit custom.

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: - Add a function that strips all unneeded prefixes from a qualified identifier, and also recognized whether the identifier identifies a namespace that is imported into the current context. - Be more intelligent when adding "namespace Namespace {...}" during source code insertion, for example while creating a definition. The namespace is not added any more if it is already imported through a "using namespace ..." directive.

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Never transfer the default-parameters between a definition and a declaration. They are only set on the declaration. This fixes a recent regression where default-parameters either were deleted from the declaration, or were duplicated from the declaration to the definition.

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Move code out of the assertion

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg: Do not just tell the project management that the file is renamed, actually rename the file too.

logentry.msg: build++

logentry.msg: Remove dead splashscreen code.

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: Re-Add the display of the splash screen. Its shown only very shortly now, but still its nice IMHO.

logentry.msg: Update the splash screen with an image made by Ruan Strydom, thanks a lot.

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: Remove old unused dead splash screens

logentry.author: apaku
logentry.msg: Add FindKDevPlatform.cmake here as I'll be removing it from kdevplatform soon. Reasoning is that the cmake-module should be in kdelibs (maybe even upstream cmake) and not installed by kdevplatform itself, however kdevelop is supposed to be buildable with kde4.3 which won't have the cmake module yet, hence provide a fallback here.

logentry.msg: Wow, I wouldn't have thought that we had so many broken link-lines in our codebase.

Fix last commit. - Do not use QDir::separator, it's just wrong, Qt deals with it. - Adapt to the current infrastructure.
Thanks apaku for the fix, though :)

logentry.author: bbroeksema
logentry.msg:
Disable a debug statement that causes a crash because the DUChain is not locked.
A better fix might be to find out why it is not locked (assuming that it should be locked at that point). However, I'm not shure if it should be guaranteed that the DUChain is locked in mapAstDuChain.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg:
Kinda revive locals.
First, unconditionally refresh locals, since the code for doing that only when 'locals' item is expanded appears to be not working. Second, execute -stack commands in the current context. Now, locals are displayed, and refreshed as frames are changed. However, expansion state of locals is not presersed.

logentry.author: ewoerner

logentry.author: vprus

Reenable incremental variable children fetch.
From now on, KDevelop needs GDB CVS from 2009-09-17 or later.

Fix compilation with Qt-4.6.

Make expanding structures work with CVS HEAD of gdb.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg:
Execute GDB varobj command in the context of current frame.
With this patch, changing both thread and frame update the watches properly.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg: KDevelop side: Rename "active thread" to "current thread".

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg:
KDevelop side: Make thread switching work.
BUG: 207167

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Don't crash with bogus merge tokens that have no text in front. Thanks for patch by Nicolai Haehnhle BUG: 207171

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg:
Properly identify the project root. The old method is not valid anymore since the reparenting change a while ago.
BUG: 205825

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg: - Added new test to check modules automatically. - Small changes n the code.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg:
Kill the s_appRunning state.
For one thing, GDB in non-stop mode does not even have such a concept, as each thread can be run and stopped individually. Secondly, this is only used to display status messages, to a non-existent status bar.

logentry.author: apol
logentry.msg:
Let the cmake scripts set where the binaries are located.
BUG: 203975

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg: Remove definitely-unused gdb states.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg: Make the 'threads' debugger test do something testable.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg: On stop, switch to the thread that caused the stop.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg:
Create watch expressions in the context of the selected thread.
Now, if you select a thread in framestack widget, and add variable, it will be evaluated in the thread you have just selected. Unfortunately, if you hit a breakpoint the thread that has hit the breakpoint is not auto-selected yet. Also, you can select a frame as you like, and that will have no effect.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg: Update tests for platform change.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg: Use the --thread and --frame option to specify context to operate on.

logentry.author: mlaurent
logentry.msg: Remove executable attribute

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: Fix cppduchaintest: Only build uses for elaborated type specifier if it is not a forward declaration.

logentry.author: zwabel
logentry.msg: - Correctly build uses for c-style struct uses like "struct bar* a" - Add test Thanks for patch by Nicolai Hähnle

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg:
Prepare for upcoming GDB pretty-printing improvements.
The most important change is that we can display when children are added and removed from containers.
This functionality at presently needs more bleeding-edge GDB than CVS HEAD. If you are using CVS HEAD, you won't get the goodies, but nothing should break. I'll post more details when CVS HEAD of GDB is ready for testing this.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg:
Encapsulate varobj inside GdbVariable.
At this point, pretty much no code outside GdbVariable even know that varobjs exist. The exceptions are: 1. The code thay relays -var-update responso to individual GdbVariable instance. This will stay. 2. The code that creates watches and watchpoints from GdbVariable. This will be eventually refactored.

logentry.author: vprus
logentry.msg: KDevelop side: Move varobj creation to GdbVariable.
